params._owner: Address allowed to manage token allowlist.

returns._1: Encoded failure payload when validation fails.

allowToken(address).notice: Adds a token to the allowlist.

constructor.notice: Initializes policy with a starting set of allowed tokens.

disallowToken(address).notice: Removes a token from the allowlist.

explainFailure(bytes).notice: Decodes policy failure payload into a human-readable reason.

validate(address,(string,address,uint256.notice: Validates that all trade tokens are allowed.
